fields.name: additionalType
fields.title: Additional Type
fields.description: An additional type for the item.

fields.name: description
fields.title: Description
fields.description: A short description of the item.

fields.name: image
fields.title: Image
fields.description: URL of an image of the item.

fields.name: sameAs
fields.title: Same As
fields.description: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's identity. E.g. the URL of the item's Wikipedia page, Freebase page, or official website.

fields.name: dateCreated
fields.title: Date Created
fields.description: The date and time when the item was created.

fields.name: dateModified
fields.title: Date Modified
fields.description: The date and time when the item was modified.
